page.title: 16AMATEUR SPORT IN WEST HULL
page.content: COSTELLO is the main local sports centre. It is well used and had a new stadium opened recently. Though it is well used its main source of money is council grants. It offers a wide range of sports (i.e. soccer, rugby, cricket, squash, tennis, badminton, weight training and athletics). Other sports facilities are Pickering park, most schools and East park. FOOTBALL in our area its mostly played for fun. The majority of people know the rules, but people change them according to where they are playing. RUGBY has 2 separate games, rugby union which is only played in senior schools in our area. Junior High Schools play rugby league. NETBALL is a game played in nearly every school, it is mostly played by girls.
